name: Blowfish Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .BFA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Over 150 products use the Blowfish algorithm. The complete list is available on the Schneier website.
NOTE: A password may be required to successfully open the file.

description: Secure file encrypted using the Blowfish encryption method; uses a symmetric block cipher and a variable-length key, from 32 bits to 448 bits, to encrypt the file.
